attributes.action: reduce tax payments on private pensions due to loss from economy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: remove, or greatly reduce ANY payment of Tax from a private pension once a person starts to draw his pension or Annuity, we are losing thousands daily due to unforeseen economic change so where our pension may be worth 15-20% less, then up it by removing tax from its payments out, i.e remove PAYE from all pensions under £450 per WEEK
